product.name: Spectrum Euro Arched Server Contemporary Stacked, 2-Tier Bowls for Modern Kitchen Counters, Sleek Fruit Basket Stand, Matt White
product.description: Store all your kitchen essentials beautifully with Euro! This collection expands into a luxurious white finish, giving a modern and minimalist vibe to any kitchen. The smooth polished wire adds a contemporary aspect to your stylish countertop organization. Crafted from solid steel, its sturdy construction allows this collection to last for years to come.
product.bullet_points:
• Rich White Finish: The Euro White collection features a luxurious White finish that makes for a beautiful display in the kitchen.
• Keep Produce Fresh: The oval baskets are designed to keep produce fresh for longer. The open basket design allows fruit and other produce to ripen evenly.
• Space Saving Design: With double the storage and half the space, this 2-Tier Fruit Basket provides an ample amount of storage.
• Sleek Design: The smooth polished wire coordinates with a variety of kitchen décor styles.
• Durable Material: Crafted from solid steel, the 2-Tier Fruit Basket's sturdy construction will last for years to come.
• Dimensions: 6.5" H x 12.5" W x 10.25" L.
• To Clean: Wipe clean with damp cloth and towel dry.
